strings.string: Warning: Login credentials will not be saved in encrypted form!
Use audio version (may not be available for all contents)
You need to configure your login credentials[CR]before you can use this add-on.
Could not log into your Massengeschmack account,[CR]please check your login credentials!
Your login credentials for these contents are invalid,[CR]maybe you didn't subscribe to them?

Fernsehkritik-TV is a satirical and critical magazine, moderated by Holger Kreymeier which first aired in 2007.[CR]The magazine deals with current TV shows and throws a skeptical glance at them. Popular topics are bad journalism, (scripted) reality shows, call-in TV and many more.[CR][CR]Secondary shows are “Postecke” and “Sendeschluss”.

Pantoffel-TV is a magazine about all cultural things you can enjoy at home or (almost) anywhere else. It is the big successor of the discontinued movie critique YouTube series “Pantoffelkino-TV”. The main topics of Pantoffel-TV are new releases of books, movies, music albums, games etc.

Pressesch(l)au is a magazine moderated by Lars Golenia that concerns itself with all kinds of serious, not so serious, simply bizarre or rather rubbishy press releases. Be it “Brigitte”, “Bravo“, “Die Welt”, “Der Spiegel” or a teddy bear magazine – Lars reads them all and reviews them on stage.
In this category you find all extra content regarding Massengeschmack such as „Massengeschmack Direkt“ or the satirical weekly show „Das Studio“.
Pasch-TV is a magazine in which Holger and guests try one new board game release each episode.
Netzprediger is an online magazine about the Internet with all its bright and dark sides: fun, fraud, absurdities and much more, presented by the virtual moderator Untenein G. Blendet.
Asynchron is about dubbing of TV series and movies. How good are the voice actors? How closely related to the original are the dialogs?

In Tonangeber Nils reviews new music album releases and live concert DVDs. He also invites musicians as guests into the studio and talks with them about their music and performances. Featuring Klaus Kauker.
Information, Education, Scepticism Conspiracy Theories, Urban Legends
Hoaxilla-TV is a video series by the moderators of Hoaxilla, a sceptic podcast about myths, urban legends, conspiracy theories, culture and science.
The following shows are currently online
All Fernsehkritik-TV episodes and extras, including Postecke, uncut interview and other specials.
Postecke is a video podcast where Holger reads and answers letters from Fernsehkritik-TV viewers (now replaced by Massengeschmack Direkt).
Sendeschluss is a weekly retro TV magazine in which Holger deals with either very iconic or very bizarre TV shows from back in the day.
All Massengeschmack-TV content, including “Massengeschmack Direkt“, “Das Studio” and any extras.
“Das Studio” is the Massengeschmack reality show. It is guaranteed to be fake and scripted!
Fan mail and live talk for subscribers.
Postecke has been replaced by “Massengeschmack Direkt”. Click on this link to go to the new “Massengeschmack Direkt” category. You can also find it in the main category „Massengeschmack-TV“
